keyEvents.title: Evacuation Warning
keyEvents.description: Conis arrives at Angel Island and warns the citizens about Enel's plan to destroy the island, urging them to evacuate.
keyEvents.significance: Angel Island becomes the site of a desperate evacuation effort as its inhabitants learn the truth about Enel's destructive intentions.

keyEvents.title: Birka Comparison
keyEvents.description: McKinley warns that Angel Island could become another Birka if they don't evacuate, revealing the danger they face.
keyEvents.significance: The threat to Angel Island is made concrete by comparison to Birka's fate.

statusHistory.description: Under threat of destruction by Enel, evacuation begins

significance: One of the main populated areas of Skypiea, now under threat of destruction by Enel

keyEvents.title: Birka's Destruction Revealed
keyEvents.description: McKinley reveals that Birka, a sky island to the southeast where Enel was raised, was destroyed by Enel six years ago.
keyEvents.significance: First revelation of Birka's existence and destruction, establishing Enel's history of genocide and the precedent for Skypiea's potential fate.

statusHistory.description: Destroyed by Enel six years before Episode 182 (approximately 8 years before the current story timeline)

population: All inhabitants presumably killed in destruction
significance: Enel's homeland that he destroyed before coming to Skypiea, demonstrating his capacity for mass destruction and establishing him as a genocidal tyrant

name.japanese: ジャイアント・ジャック

keyEvents.title: Aisa Guides Luffy Through Giant Jack
keyEvents.description: Aisa uses her Mantra ability to guide Luffy through the complex interior of Giant Jack to reach Enel's location.
keyEvents.significance: Giant Jack serves as the labyrinthine path that Luffy must navigate to reach the final confrontation with Enel.

significance: Massive beanstalk structure that houses Enel's ark and serves as the setting for the climactic battles

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Enel Battle Begins
keyEvents.description: Luffy confronts Enel in the cave-like interior of the Ark Maxim, beginning their climactic battle.
keyEvents.significance: The primary battleground for the confrontation between Luffy and Enel that will determine Skypiea's fate.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Immunity Revealed
keyEvents.description: In this location, the crucial revelation occurs that Luffy is immune to Enel's lightning attacks.
keyEvents.significance: The site of the turning point in the Skypiea arc where Enel's vulnerability is exposed.

significance: Enel's flying ship and the location where he plans to destroy Skypiea and reach Fairy Vearth
